Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Don Pedro Hotel in Ischia, you'll be near the bay and minutes from English Beach and Castiglione Thermal Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Ischia Port and Piazza degli Eroi.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a sauna.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Don Pedro Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Don Pedro Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Don Pedro Hotel in Ischia, you'll be near the bay and minutes from English Beach and Castiglione Thermal Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Ischia Port and Piazza degli Eroi.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

English Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Ischia Port - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Castiglione Thermal Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza degli Eroi - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Indiana Park - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Pescatori Beach - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Belliazzi Thermal Baths - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Diocesan Museum - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Museo del Mare - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Guevara Tower - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Cartaromana Beach - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Aragonese Castle - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Mount Epomeo - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Nitrodi Hot Springs - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Museo Archeologico di Pithecusae - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi

The preferred airport for Don Pedro Hotel is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 33.1 km / 20.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
